concept.title: Running XSD2DITA from the command line
concept.shortdesc: How to run XSD2DITA from the command line.

section.p: In the bin directory there is a shell script called xsd2dita.sh. This takes two arguments the first argument is the XSD to process. The section argument is the output folder.

example.title: Example of using xsd2dita.sh from the command line
